definitions.definition: The result of shortening or reducing ; abridgment .

A shortened or contracted form of a word or phrase used to represent the whole, using omission of letters, and sometimes substitution of letters, or duplication of initial letters to signify plurality, including signs such as +, =, @. [Late 16 century.] (The addition of quotations indicative of this usage is being sought:)
examples: Hants is an abbreviation of Hampshire.

definitions.definition: A notation used in music score to denote a direction, as pp or mf.
One or more dashes through the stem of a note, dividing it respectively into quavers , semiquavers , demisemiquavers , or hemidemisemiquavers .
Any convenient short form used as a substitution for an understood or inferred whole.
Loss during evolution of the final stages of the ancestral ontogenetic pattern.
Reduction to lower terms , as a fraction .

main_definition: The result of shortening or reducing ; abridgment . [First attested around 1350 to 1470.]
secondary_definitions: ( linguistics ) A shortened or contracted form of a word or phrase used to represent the whole, using omission of letters, and sometimes substitution of letters, or duplication of initial letters to signify plurality, including signs such as +, =, @. [Late 16 century.] (The addition of quotations indicative of this usage is being sought:)
( music ) A notation used in music score to denote a direction, as pp or mf.
( music ) One or more dashes through the stem of a note, dividing it respectively into quavers , semiquavers , demisemiquavers , or hemidemisemiquavers .
Any convenient short form used as a substitution for an understood or inferred whole.
( biology ) Loss during evolution of the final stages of the ancestral ontogenetic pattern.
( mathematics ) Reduction to lower terms , as a fraction .
